original_text: When Moses had finished speaking all these words, 46 he said to the people, ‘Remember carefully the message that I have spoken to you today. You must teach these words to your children. They must learn to obey all the words of God's Law. korean_text: 모세가 이 모든 말씀을 온 이스라엘에게 말하기를 마치고

sentences.original_text: When Moses had finished speaking all these words
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 이 모든 말씀을 마치고 나서

sentences.original_text: that I have spoken to you today
You must teach these words to your children
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 자녀들에게 이 말씀들을 가르쳐야 한다

sentences.original_text: They must learn to obey all the words
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모든 말씀에 순종하는 것을 배워야 한다
